str2: And, even, also, namely.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Four. Or neuter tessara a plural number; four.
An animal, living creature. Neuter of a derivative of zao; a live thing, i.e. An animal.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Six. A primary numeral; six.
A wing, pinion. From a derivative of petomai; a wing.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To be full of. A primary verb; to swell out, i.e. Be full.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.
In a circle round, round about. Adverb from the same as kukloi; from the circle, i.e. All around.
And, even, also, namely.
From eso; from inside; also used as equivalent to eso.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
And, even, also, namely.
The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Rest, cessation from labor, refreshment. From anapano; intermission; by implication, recreation.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Ruler of all, ruler of the universe, the almighty. From pas and kratos; the all-ruling, i.e. God.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
And, even, also, namely.

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

str2: To come, go.
